TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PingCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此类的实例传递给<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler>时调用的方法<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>调用完成。 <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>方法以异步方式发送 Internet 控制消息协议 (ICMP) 回显请求并等待相应的 ICMP 回显回复消息。 <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs.Reply%2A>属性包含的 ICMP 回送请求结果。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以异步方式发送 ICMP 回显请求。
[!code-cpp[NclPingAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclPingAsync/CPP/asyncping.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NclPingAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclPingAsync/CS/asyncping.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Reply As PingReply

Docs.summary: 获取包含数据的对象，该数据描述发送 Internet 控制消息协议 (ICMP) 回送请求消息并接受相应的 ICMP 回送答复消息的尝试。
Docs.value: 对象，描述 ICMP 回送请求结果。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果值<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A>不<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus.Success>，不应使用返回的值<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>， <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A>，和<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A>属性。 <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>和<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A>属性将返回零，和<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A>属性将返回`null`。
## Examples 下面的代码示例实现的方法，用于响应<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.PingCompleted>事件。 有关完整示例，请参阅<xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs>类概述。
[!code-cpp[NclPingAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclPingAsync/CPP/asyncping.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[NclPingAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclPingAsync/CS/asyncping.cs#4)]
